This folder contains code to use in other languages (e.g. IDL, Matlab, R, etc)
and a brief explanaition of the functionalities

File:
./lucianaMatlab/generatingSyntheticRain/Precip_maps_generation.m
Description:
This Matlab code creates synthetic rainfall maps with the appropriate format
required by CUENCAS.  It uses functions in the companion files GenerateMapJet.m,
Gener_vhc.m, Gener_Asc.m

File:

Description:
